attributes.action: Stop Tax avoiding Amazon from using tube station offices vacated by redundant tube workers.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been widely reported that Amazon are in negotiations with transport for London to use the empty offices left by the workers they have made redundant , for collection points for parcels.

They are reducing the tax coffers by firstly making a large portion of the workforce redundant and then reducing it more by allowing a tax avoiding company use the very offices they worked in, a double negative on our society.
